summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1475, for the improvement of 26th Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from East Alder Street o a point 100 feet north of East Marion Street, by the construction of sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins, and their appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 15796 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
